feature.name: Service Triggered Mobility  Multi-Layer Service-Triggered Mobility
feature.node_type: Baseband Radio Node, DU Radio Node
feature.summary: The Multi-Layer Service-Triggered Mobility feature provides the possibility to configure

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_ERAB_DATA_INFO
parameters.description: Indicates the QCIs of set up, released, or modified bearers that                                     lead to a measurement reconfiguration within the corresponding                                     procedure.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_ERAB_DATA_INFO
parameters.description: Indicates the E-RAB-related procedure (setup, release, or modify)                                     that is executed when the event containing transparent E-RAB or                                     E-RAB procedure-related data is issued.

events.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_ERAB_DATA_INFO
events.description: Indicates the QCIs of set up, released, or modified bearers that                                     lead to a measurement reconfiguration within the corresponding                                     procedure.

events.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_ERAB_DATA_INFO
events.description: Indicates the E-RAB-related procedure (setup, release, or modify)                                     that is executed when the event containing transparent E-RAB or                                     E-RAB procedure-related data is issued.

feature.activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011815 MO instance.
feature.deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011815 MO instance.
